headline: These Are the 2 Worst-Performing Stocks in the Dow Jones Industrial Average So Far in 2025
summary: The DJIA is in positive territory thus far in 2025.  The Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJINDICES: ^DJI) is up nearly 5% so far this year, with many of its best performers rising in value by 20% to 30%.  Two well-known stocks in the DJIA have collapsed in value through the first six months of 2025.

headline: Salesforce (CRM) Wins Analyst Confidence With AI Advances and Price Hike Potential
summary: Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the Trending AI Stocks in Focus This Week. On July 16, Citizens JMP analyst Patrick Walravens reiterated a “Market Outperform” rating on the stock with a $430.00 price target. The firm came out optimistic on the stock following its chat with Richard Socher at the Citizens Technology Forum. The forum […]
